Type / Format: Water-level time series tables; links to WIMS
API Availability: No open REST API; WIMS is login-based
Notes: Download historical water levels and documentation; telemetry data handled via WIMS.
Use WRIS to query and export groundwater level data for CGWB stations.
Use for analysis, not for data fetch; can complement your dashboard tools section.

Type / Format: WebGIS with CSV/Excel downloads; GIS layers
API Availability: No official open REST API documented
Notes: Provides groundwater level, aquifer maps, and 130+ layers via interactive interface and downloads.
Mentions telemetry modules and automatic report generation for WRIS.

API Availability: No detailed public groundwater API docs
Notes: Entry point for WRIS/WIMS-related data; access details vary by module.

Type / Format: Web dashboard for groundwater resource assessment outputs
Notes: Useful for derived indicators and visualisations related to groundwater resources.

API Availability: No REST API on CPCB site
Notes: Use for surface water and some groundwater quality time series, station-wise.
Example of CPCB dataset on OGD; check each resource for API status.
Gives station locations and attributes for all groundwater quality stations across India.
